text: Hillcrest may refer to: ==Places== ===Australia=== *Hillcrest, Queensland, a suburb of Logan City *Hillcrest, South Australia, suburb of Adelaide ===Canada=== *Hillcrest, Alberta, also known as Hillcrest Mines *Hillcrest, Norfolk County, Ontario, an unincorporated community *Hillcrest, Prince Edward County, Ontario, an unincorporated community ===Ireland=== Hillcrest, Lucan Housing estate in Lucan, Co. title: Hillcrest
